response.original_title: Mia Parrish: The World Of Romance
response.overview: Experience the magic of Mia Parrish in The World of Romance, a behind-the-scenes look at her iconic Romance album and world tour. This intimate film features exclusive home footage, backstage moments, and the creative journey behind her music.  The highlight is a full, electrifying live performance of the Los Angeles show from the Romance World Tour, capturing Mia’s artistry at its peak. A must-watch for fans, it’s a celebration of love, music, and the connection between an artist and her audience.
response.tagline: Welcome to the world of Romance
response.title: Mia Parrish: The World Of Romance

results.name: The World Of Romance - Trailer (UNCANNY VALLEY ROBLOX VERSION)
